name: Secret Pyramid
description:
There are rumours about the treasure of the Egyptian Pharaoh hidden in the just discovered Secret Pyramid. Will you dare to accept the challenge and explore the maze full of mysteries and danger?  

  • Master your throwing skills! 
  • Use different weapons to clear stages!
  • Outsmart your enemies!    
  • Check different game modes!    

INSTALL NOW and be the first who found the ancient treasure!
